name: MyMiniFactory
description: MyMiniFactory is a world-leading 3D printable object-sharing platform, where thousands of 3D designers around the world upload and share files that can be 3D printed on affordable desktop 3D printers. We are a digital community and platform for objects, the same way that YouTube is a digital community and platform for videos. We're building out the content solution for a world where desktop 3D printers are ubiquitous.

team.name: Sylvain Preumont
team.bioHtml: Founder MyMiniFactory • Owner,COO&CIO at AIS • Founder and CEO Agefinance • Founder Diadeis • Worked at @Arthur Andersen • Studied at @Ecole Polytechnique

jobs.title: Full Stack Wed developer
jobs.description:
MyMiniFactory is looking for a talented full stack web developer to work alongside our team to build new innovative and exciting features.

We expect you to have a real interest for creative communities and hardware innovation.

Our stack is Symfony, Javascript (React), mysql.  

We expect you to have a genuine passion for coding, combined with a very strong background in web techno acquired at a world top university.

jobs.title: React Developer
jobs.description:
MyMiniFactory is the leading open platform for designers to share and sell 3d printable files with makers.

We are looking for a Front end React developer to join our strong team of developer to keep working on new exciting features for our large community of designers and makers.

You will be working closely with our UX/UI developer and our CTO.

jobs.title: Sales - Business developer
jobs.description:
we are looking for a talented sales / business developer with a real passion for 3d printing.

Compensation is fixed + bonus on sales
